sentences.en: "Hello," he said. "This is an unexpected pleasure."
"You won't get away with this," he said with unexpected bravado.
sentences.cn: “这事你休想就这么过去，”他以出人意料的强横语气说道。

sentences.en: Any unexpected circumstance that arises may catalyze a sudden escalation of violence.
sentences.cn: 任何突如其来的情况都可能造成暴力骤然升级。

sentences.en: Be prepared for unexpected news concerning your finances.
sentences.cn: 对财务上的意外状况要做到有备无患。

sentences.en: For all its drama, the event was not unexpected.
sentences.cn: 虽然这件事带有戏剧性，但并不意外。

sentences.en: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.cn: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

sentences.en: He had romped through the maze of questions with unexpected ease.
sentences.cn: 想不到他不费吹灰之力很快就解决了那些错综复杂的问题。

sentences.en: He is notorious for making unexpected, often self-contradictory, comments.
sentences.cn: 他发表的那些出人意料而且经常自相矛盾的评论令他臭名昭著。

sentences.en: He made a brief, unexpected appearance at the office.
sentences.cn: 他出乎意料地在办公室露了一下脸。

sentences.en: Help may also come from some unexpected places.
sentences.cn: 帮助也可能来自某些意想不到的地方。

sentences.en: It was the most unexpected piece of news one could possibly imagine.
sentences.cn: 这条新闻最出人意料了，真是让人想象不到。

sentences.en: Keep savings as a buffer against unexpected cash needs.
sentences.cn: 存些积蓄以备不时之需。
事态发生了意想不到的转变。

sentences.en: She claimed the unemployment figures were not entirely unexpected.
sentences.cn: 她声称失业率并非完全出乎意料。

sentences.en: Such beauty was unexpected in the midst of the city.
sentences.cn: 市中心有这样的美景真是出乎意料。

sentences.en: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.cn: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.en: They were horrified at this unexpected turn of events.
sentences.cn: 这种出乎意料的形势变化让他们无比震惊。

phrases.tran_cn: 意外的消息；出乎意料的新闻

trans.tran_en: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it
